timestamp: # This ledger is populated upon KNOT closure with actual TT distributions.
# Each row represents a reward for a specific KNU contribution.
#   timestamp              - ISO 8601 UTC timestamp of award
#   delta_residual_adjacent_sum - Spillover impact on adjacent KNOTs
#   bonus_mult             - Bonus multiplier applied (1.0 if none)
#   tx_id                  - Transaction identifier for ledger integrity
# Hash chain integrity: Each tx_id = SHA-256(previous_tx_id + row_data)
